title: Total assets of HSBC 2007 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Total assets in billion U.S.dollars, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2016 to 2012.
But, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2019 to 2016.
Likewise, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2012 to 2009.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2009 to 2007.
gold: This statistic presents the total assets of the British bank HSBC from 2007 to 2019 . In 2019 , the total assets of the HSBC bank reached 2.72 trillion U.S. dollars . HSBC - additional information HSBC Holdings plc is a British multinational bank and financial services organization based in London , United Kingdom .
